Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Responses to Varicella Zoster Virus Vaccination
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Responses to Varicella Zoster Virus Vaccination
Configuration.Description: The study sequenced antibody heavy chain gene rearrangements from 4 identical twin pairs undergoing vaccination with Varicella Zoster viral vaccine.
Configuration.StudyInEx:
Inclusion:

  • Identical twins
  • Prior history of chicken pox

Exclusion:

  • Episode of shingles within 5 years of the study
  • Prior vaccination with Zostavax

ConsentGroup.longName: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
